text:
="preserve">Ignasi Farreres Bochaca (1 August 1939 – 11 October 2020) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the United to Advance. Farreres Bochaca was a member of the Generalitat de Catalunya from 1988 to 1999. He was born in La Pobla de Segur, Spain.
Farreres Bochaca died on 11 October 2020 in Barcelona at the age of 81.
